price: 法老说：“难道我们没有在我们的家中把你自幼抚养成人，而且你在我们家中逗留过许多年吗？
arabic: قَالَ أَلَمۡ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدٗا وَلَبِثۡتَ فِينَا مِنۡ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qāla alam nurabbika fīnā walīdan walabith'ta fīnā min ʿumurika sinīna
